unstructured.content: We need specialized insurance for our defense contracts and R&D operations. Our products include advanced weapons systems and experimental technology.
Risk management is a top priority. We've had several testing incidents in the past with prototypes, the largest resulting in a $3.5M claim for property damage.
We currently have a $50M general liability policy with a $500K deductible. We also maintain a $100M umbrella policy given the high-risk nature of our work.
Our international operations require global coverage. We have facilities in 12 countries and conduct field testing in remote locations worldwide.
Worker safety is critically important. We have enhanced workers' compensation coverage due to the hazardous environments some of our employees work in.
